GK19bahcar3u:36: śaratsamayārambhe rājñaḥ samīpādvāṇo bandhūndraṣṭuṃ punarāpi taṃ brāhnaṇādhivāsamagāt /
GK19bahcar3u:49: prīyamāṇena ca manasā sarvāṃstānparyapṛcchart--“kāccadetāvato divasānsu kano yūyam?
GK19bahcar3u:50: apratyūhā vā samyakkaraṇaparitoṣitadvijacakrā krātavī kriyā kriyate?
GK19bahcar3u:60: saṃtoṣajuṣāṃ satatasaṃnihitavidyāvinodānāṃ vaitānavahnimātrasahāyānāṃ kiyanmātraṃ na kṛtyaṃ sukhitayā sakalabhuvanabhujibhṛjaṅgarājadehadīrghe rakṣati kṣitiṃ kṣitibhuje /
GK19bahcar3u:62: viśeṣeṇa tu tvayi vimuktakausīdye parameśvarapārśvavartini vetrāsanamadhitiṣṭhati /
GK19bahcar3u:63: sarve ca yathāśakti yathāvibhavaṃ yathākāla ca saṃpādyante viprajanocitāḥ kriyākalāpāḥ'
GK19bahcar3u:67: bhuktavantaṃ ca ta sarve jñātayaḥ paryavārayan /
GK19bahcar3u:68: atrāntare dukūlapaṭṭaprabhave śikhaṇḍyapāṅgapāṇḍunī pauṇḍre vāsasī vasānaḥ snānāvasānasamaye vanditayā torthamṛdā gorocanayā ca racitatilakaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:77: sthitvā ca mudūrtamiva tatkālāpanītasūtraveṣṭanamapi nakhakiraṇairmṛdumṛṇālasūtrauravāveṣṭitaṃ pustakaṃ puronihitaśaraśalākāyantrake nidhāya,
GK19bahcar3u:78: pṛṣṭhataḥ sanīḍasaṃniviṣṭābhyāṃ madhukarapārāvatābhyāṃ vaṃśikābhyāṃ datte sthānake prābhātikaprapāṭhakacchedacihnīkṛtamantaraṃ patramutkṣipya,
GK19bahcar3u:79: gṛhītvā ca katipayapatralaghvīṃ kapāṭikām kṣālayanniva maṣīmalinānyakṣarāṇi dantakāntibhiḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:81: mukhasaṃnihitasarasvatīnūpuraravairiva gamakairmadhurairākṣipanmanāṃsi śrotṝṇāṃ gītyā pavamānaproktaṃ purāṇaṃ papāṭha /
GK19bahcar3u:82: tasmiṃśca tathā śrutisubhagagītigarbhaṃ paṭhati sudṛṣṭau nātidūravartī vandī sūcībāṇastāramadhureṇa gītidhvanimanuvartamānaḥ svareṇedamāryāyugalamagāyat--
GK19bahcar3u:83: tadapi munigītamatipṛthu tadapi jagadvyāpi pāvanaṃ tadapi/
GK19bahcar3u:87: tacchrutvā bāṇasya catvāraḥ pitāmahamukhapajhā iva vedābhyāsapāvatritamūrtayaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:97: sukṛtasaṃgrahābhyāsaguravo labdhasādhuśabdā loka iva vyākaraṇe 'pi sakalapurāṇarājarṣicaritābhijñāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:105: vayasi vacasi yaśasi tapasi sadasi mahasi vapuṣi yajuṣi ca prathamāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:110: atha teṣāṃ kanīyānkamaladaladīrghalocanaḥ śyāmalo nāma bāṇasya preyānprāṇānāmapi vaśayitā dattasaṃjñastaiḥ sapraṇayaṃ daśanajyotsnāsnapitakakubhā mukhendunā babhāṣe--“tāta bāṇa/
GK19bahcar3u:111: dvijānāṃ rājā gurudāragrahaṇamakārṣīt purūravā brāhnaṇadhanatṛṣṇayā dayitenāyuṣā vyayujyata /
GK19bahcar3u:130: itthaṃ nāsti rājatvamapakalaṅgamṛte devadevādamataḥ sarvadvīpabhūjo harṣāt /
GK19bahcar3u:132: tathā hi-atra balajitā niścalīkṛtāścalantaḥ kṛtapakṣāḥ kṣitibhṛtaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:139: atra parameśvareṇa tuṣāraśailabhuvo durgāyā gṛhītaḥ karaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:140: atra lokanāthena diśāṃ mukheṣu parikalpitā lokapālāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:143: ato 'sya sugṛhītanāmnaḥ purāyarāśeḥ pūrvapuruṣavaṃśānukrameṇāditaḥ prabhṛti caritamicchāmaḥ śrotum /
GK19bahcar3u:145: ayaskāntamaṇaya iva lohāni nīrasaniṣṭhurāṇi kṣullakānāmapyākarṣanti manāṃsi mahatāṃ guṇāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:147: kasya na dvitīyamahābhārate bhavedasya carite kutūhalam?
GK19bahcar3u:149: bhavatu bhārgavo 'yaṃ vaṃśaḥ śucinānena puṇyarājarṣicaritaśravaṇena sutarāṃ śucitaraḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:155: paraguṇānurāgiṇī priyajanakathāśravaṇarasarabhasamohitā ca manye mahatāmapi matirapaharati pravivekam /
GK19bahcar3u:164: kaḥ khalu puruṣāyuṣaśatenāpi śaknuyādavikalamasya caritaṃ varṇayitum?
GK19bahcar3u:171: divasaḥ paścāllambanamānakapilakiraṇajaṭābhārabhāsvaro bhagavānbhārgavarāma iva samantapañcakaru dheramahāhrade nimajjati sadhyārāgapaṭale pūṣā
GK19bahcar3u:177: ravirathaturagamārgānusāreṇa yamamahiṣa iva dhāvati nabhasi tamasi,
GK19bahcar3u:178: krameṇa ca gṛhatāpasakuṭorakapaṭalāvalambiṣu raktātapacchedaiḥ saha sahṛteṣu valkaleṣu,
GK19bahcar3u:186: tāladhvanidhāvamānānantāntevāsini alasavṛddhaśrotriyānumatena galadgranthadaṇḍakodgāriṇi sadyāṃ samavadhārayati vaṭharaviṭabaṭusamāje,
GK19bahcar3u:188: prāpte pradoṣārambhe bhavanamāgatyopaviṣṭaḥ snigdhairbandhubhiśca sārdha tayaiva goṣṭhayā tasthau /
GK19bahcar3u:190: itareṣāṃ tu sarvaṣāṃ nimīlitadṛśāmapyanupajātanidrāṇāṃ kamalavanānāmiva sūryodayaṃ pratipālayatāṃ kutūhalena kathamapi sā kṣapā kṣayamagacchat
GK19bahcar3u:191: atha yāminyāsturye yāma pratibuddhaḥ sa eva bandī ślokadvayamagāyat--
GK19bahcar3u:195: mandaṃ śabdāyamāno vilikhati śayanādutthitaḥ kṣmāṃ khureṇa' // 3.5 //
GK19bahcar3u:200: bāṇastu tacchratbā samutsṛjya nidrāmutthāya pkṣālya vadanamupāsya ca bhagavatīṃ saṃdhyāmudite ca bhagavati savitari gṛhītatāmbūlastatraivātiṣṭhat
GK19bahcar3u:203: asāvapi pūrvoddhātena viditābhiprāyasteṣāṃ puro harṣacaritaṃ kathayitumārebhe-- śrūyatām--asti
GK19bahcar3u:204: puṇyakṛtāmadhivāso vāsavāvāsa iva vasudhāmavatīrṇaḥ satatamasakīrṇavarṇavyavahārasthitiḥ kṛtayugavyavasthaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:214: dhavaladhūmimucā ketakīvanānāṃ rajobhiḥ pāṇḍurīkṛtaiḥ prathamoddhūlanabhasmadhūsaraiḥ śivapurasyeva praveśaiḥ pradeśairupaśobhitaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:224: prabhañjanamiva cāpibantīnāṃ vātahariṇīnāmiva svacchandacāriṇīnāṃ vaḍavānāṃ vṛndairvicaradbhirācitaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:231: mathitapayaḥpravāhaprakṣālitakṣitibhiḥ kṣīrodamathanārambhairiva mahāghoṣaiḥ pūritāśaḥ śrīkaṇṭho nāma janapadaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:240: vṛṣavivāhaprahatapuṇyapaṭahapaṭurava trāsitā iva nopāsarpannapamṛtyavaḥ saṃtatabrahnaghoṣabadhirīkṛtā ivāpajagmurītayaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:279: yatra ca pramadānāṃ cakṣureva sahajamuṇḍamālāmaṇḍanaṃ bhāraḥ kuvalayadaladāmāni,
GK19bahcar3u:281: priyakathā eva subhagāḥ karṇālakārā āḍambaraḥ kumḍalādiḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:282: kapolā eva satatamālokakārakā vibhavo niśāsu maṇipradopāḥ surabhiniḥsvāsākṛṣṭaṃ madhukarakulameva ramaṇīyaṃ mukhāvaraṇaṃ kulastrījanācāro jālikā,
GK19bahcar3u:288: yauvanoṣmasvedabindava eva vidagdhāḥ kucākakṛtayo hārāstu bhārāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:289: śroṇya eva viśālasphaṭikaśilātalacaturasrā rāgiṇāṃ viśramakāraṇamanimittaṃ bhavanamaṇivedikāḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:291: nūpuraravāhṛtā bhavanakalahaṃsā eva samucitāḥ saṃcaraṇasahāyā aiśvaryaprapañcāḥ parijanāḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:292: tatra ca sākṣātsahasrākṣa iva sarvavarṇadharaṃ dhanurdadhānaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:313: sarvādirājatejaḥpuñjanirmita iva rājā puṣyabhūtiriti nāmnā babhūva /
GK19bahcar3u:314: pṛṣunā gauriveyaṃ kṛteti yaḥ spardhamāna iva mahīṃ mahiṣīṃ cakāra /
GK19bahcar3u:315: nisargasvairiṇī svarucyanurodhinī ca bhavati hi mahatāṃ matiḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:332: vavurasya homālavālānalavilīyamānabahalaguggulu gandhagarbhāḥ snapanakṣīraśīkarakṣodakṣāriṇo vilvapallavadāmadalodvāhinaḥ puṇya viṣayeṣu vāyavaḥ
GK19bahcar3u:333: śivasaparyāsamucitairupāyanaiḥ prābhṛtaiśca paurāḥ pādopajīvinaḥ sacivāḥ svabhujabalanirjitāśca karadīkṛtā mahāsāmantāstaṃ siṣevire /
GK19bahcar3u:337: tathā ca paramamāheśvaraḥ sa bhūpālo lokataḥ śuśrāva bhuvi bhagavantamaparamiva sākṣāddakṣamakhamathanaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:341: yataḥ sa rājā śravaṇasamakālameva tasminbheravācārye bhagavati dvitīya iva kapardini dūragate 'pi garīyasīṃ babandha bhaktim /
GK19bahcar3u:343: atha kadācitparyaste 'stācalacumbini vāsare 'ntaḥpuravartinaṃ rājānamapasṛtya pratīhārī vijñāpitavatī--“deva/
GK19bahcar3u:363: hṛdayamadhyanibaddhagranthinā ca rāgeṇeva khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtena dhāturasāruṇena karpaṭena kṛtottarāsaṅgam,
GK19bahcar3u:371: sādaranarapativacanamuditamatistu parivrāṭ tamupanagaraṃ sarasvatītaṭavanāvalambini śūnyāyatane sthitamācacakṣe /
GK19bahcar3u:372: bhūyaścābabhāṣe--“arcayati hi mahābhāgaṃ bhagavānāśīrvatacasā' ityuktvā copaninye
GK19bahcar3u:373: yogabhārakādākṛṣya bhairavācāryaprahitāni ratnavanti bahalālokaliptāntaḥ purāṇi pañca
GK19bahcar3u:376: laṅghayitumasamartho dolāyamānena manasā sthitvā ciraṃ kathakathamapyatisaujanyanighnastāni jagrāha /
GK19bahcar3u:377: jagāda ca--“sarvaphalaprasavahetuḥ śivabhaktiriyaṃ no manorathadurlabhāni phalati phalāni /
GK19bahcar3u:379: śvo draṣṭāsmi bhagavantam' ityuktvā ca maskariṇaṃ vyasarjayat /
GK19bahcar3u:382: katipayaireva rājaputraiḥ parivṛto bhairavācāryaṃ savitāramiva śaśī draṣṭuṃ pratasthe /
GK19bahcar3u:388: atha mahataḥ kārpaṭhikavṛndasya madhye prātareva snātam,
GK19bahcar3u:393: unmiṣitā vidyutkapilenātmatejasā mahāmāṃsavikrayakrītena manaḥ śilāpaṅkeneva śiṣyalokaṃ limpantam,
GK19bahcar3u:401: sahajalalāṭabalibhaṅgasakocitakūrcabhāgāṃ bamrubhāsaṃ bhrūsaṃgatyā nirantarāmāyāminīmekāmiva bhrūlekhāṃ bibhrāṇam,
GK19bahcar3u:402: riṣatkācarakanīnikena raktāpāhganigantaṃśupratānena madhyadhvalabhāsendrāyudhenevātidīrgheṇa locanayugalena parito mahāmaṇḍalamivānekavarṇarāgamālikhantam,
GK19bahcar3u:407: kiñciddanturatayāsadāhṛdayasaṃnihitaharaṇaulicandrātapeneva nirgacchatā dantālokena dhavala yantaṃ diśaṃ jālam,
GK19bahcar3u:410: baddhavivi ghauṣadhimantrasūtrapaṅktinā sarohavalayene prakaṣṭh śaṅkhaṇḍaṃ pūṣṇao dantatamiva bhagavatā bhavena bhagne bhaktyā bhṛṣaṇīkṛtaṃ
GK19bahcar3u:413: atinibiḍanīlalomamaṇḍalavicitaṃ ca dhyānalabdhena jyotiṣā dagdhamiva hṛdayadeśaṃ dadhānarm,
GK19bahcar3u:420: śikhara nikhātakubjakālāyasakaṇṭakena vaiṇavena viśākhikādaṇḍena sarvavidyayayāsiddhivighnavināyakāpanayanāṅkuśeneva satatapārśvavartinā virājamānam,
GK19bahcar3u:449: bhairavācāryastu dūrādeva rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā śaśinamiva jalanidhiścacāla /
GK19bahcar3u:452: narapatirapi prītivistāryamāṇadhavalimnā cakṣuṣā pratyarpayanniva bahutarāṇi puṇḍarīkavanāni
GK19bahcar3u:456: upadarśitapraśrayastu rājā mattahasakalagadgadasvarasubhagāṃ madhurasamayīṃ mahānadīmiva pravartayanvācaṃ vyājahāra--“bhagavan/
GK19bahcar3u:458: aśeṣarājakopekṣitāyā hatalakṣmyāḥ khalvayaṃ śīlāparādho draviṇadaurātmyaṃ vā yadevamācarati mayi guruḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:463: āsatāṃ ca bhavanta evātra' iti vyāhṛtyā parijanopanīte vāsasi niṣasāda /
GK19bahcar3u:465: āsīne ca sarājake parijane śiṣyajane ca samucitamardhyādikaṃ cakre /
GK19bahcar3u:466: krameṇa ca nṛpamādhuryahṛtāntaḥkaraṇaḥ śaśikaranikaravimalā daśanadīdhitīḥ sphurantīḥ śivabhaktīriva sākṣād draśayannuvāca-“tāta/
GK19bahcar3u:476: pratanuguṇagrāhyāṇi kusumānīva hi bhavanti satāṃ manāṃsi /
GK19bahcar3u:477: api ca, vidbatsaṃmatāḥ śrūyamāṇā api sādhavaḥ śabdā iva sudhore 'pi hi manasi yaśāṃsi kuvaṃnti /
GK19bahcar3u:478: vivaraṃ viśataḥ kutūhalasya phenadhavarlaḥ srotobhirivāpahriyamāṇo guṇagaṇairānoto 'smi kalyāṇinā' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:480: anurakteṣvapi śarīrādiṣa sādhūnāṃ svāmina eva praṇayinaḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:482: anenaivāgamanena spṛhaṇīyaṃ padamāropito 'smi guruṇā' iti vividhābhiśca kathābhiściraṃ sthitvā gṛhamagāt /
GK19bahcar3u:484: tasmai ca rājā sāntaḥpuraṃ saparijanaṃ sakoṣamātmānaṃ niveditavān /
GK19bahcar3u:490: bhavādṛśā eva bhājanaṃ bhūteḥ' iti sthitvā ca kañcitkālaṃ jagāma /
GK19bahcar3u:491: parivrāṭ tenaiva krameṇa pañca pañca rājatāni puṇḍarīkāṇyupāyanīcakāra /
GK19bahcar3u:496: so 'yaṃ bhavadbhujayogyo gṛhyatām' ityabhidhāyāpahṛtakarpaṭāvacchādanāt parivārādācakarṣa śaradgaganatalamiva piṇḍatāṃ nītam,
GK19bahcar3u:504: atitīkṣṇatayā pavanasparśenāpi ruṣeva kvaṇantam maṇisabhākuṭṭimapatatpratibimbaccajhanātmānamapi dvidheva pāṭayantam,
GK19bahcar3u:517: avanipatistu taṃ gṛhītvā kareṇāyudhaprītyā pratimānibhenālihganniva suciraṃ dadarśa /
GK19bahcar3u:518: saṃdideśa ca-“vaktavyo bhagavān paradravyagrahaṇāvajñādurvidagdhamapi hi me mano yuṣmadviṣaye na śaknoti vacanavyatikramavyabhicāramācaritum' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:519: paribrāṭ tu gṛhīte tasmin parituṣṭaḥ “svasti bhavate /
GK19bahcar3u:521: nṛpaśca prakṛtyā vīrarasānurāgī tena kṛpāṇenāmanyata karatalavartinī medinīm /
GK19bahcar3u:522: atha bajatsu divaseṣvakadā bhairavācāryo rājānamupaṅvare sopagrahamavādīt--“tāta/
GK19bahcar3u:528: bhagavato mahākālahṛdayanāmno mahāmantrasya kṛṣṇasragambarānulepanenākalpena kalpakathitena mahāśmaśāne japakoṭyā kṛtapūrvasevo 'smi /
GK19bahcar3u:533: ekaḥ sa evāsmākaṃ ṭāṭibhanāmā bālamitraṃ maskarī yo bhavantamupatiṣṭhate /
GK19bahcar3u:536: yadi sādhu manyase tato nīyatāmayaṃ diṅnāgahastadīrgho gṛhītāṭṭahāso niśāmekāmekadiṅmukhārgalatāṃ bāhuḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:537: ' iti kṛtavacasi ca tasminnandhakārapraviṣṭa iva dṛṣṭaprakāśaḥ prāptopakārādakāśaḥ pramuditenāntarātmanā narendraḥ samabhāṣata--“bhagavan/
GK19bahcar3u:540: cakāra ca saṃketam--“asyāmevāgāminyāmasitapakṣacaturdaśīkṣaṇayāmiyatyāṃ belāyāmamuṣmin mahāśmaśānasamīpabhāji śūnyāyatane śastradvitīyenāyuṣmatā draṣṭavyā vayam' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:541: athātikrānteṣvahaḥsu prāptāyāṃ ca tasyāmeva kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ śaivena vidhinā dīkṣitaḥ kṣitipo niyamānabhūta /
GK19bahcar3u:543: tataḥ pariṇate divase kenāpi karmasādhanāya kṛtarudhirabalividhānāsviva lohitāyamānāsu dikṣu rudhirabalilampaṭāsu ca belālajihvāsviva lambamānāsu ca ravidīdhitiṣu,
GK19bahcar3u:544: narendrānurāgeṇa gṛhītāparadiśi svayamiva dikpālatāṃ cikīrṣati savitari,
GK19bahcar3u:547: nabhasi puñjībhavati raudraṃ karma didṛkṣamāṇā iva nakṣatragaṇe vigāḍhāyāṃ śarvaryām,
GK19bahcar3u:549: rājā sāntaḥpuraṃ parijanaṃ vañcayitvā vāmakarasphuratsarurdakṣiṇakareṇotkhāta khaḍgamaṭṭahāsamādāya
GK19bahcar3u:551: rājalakṣmyā pṛṣṭhataḥ parimalalagnamadhukaraveṇivyājena keśeṣviva karmasiddhimākarṣannekākī nagarānniragāt /
GK19bahcar3u:553: atha pratyupajagmuste trayo 'pi drauṇikṛpakṛtavarmāṇa iva sauptike saṃnaddhāḥ snātāḥ sragviṇo gṛhītavikaṭaveṣāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:557: itarakarṇāvalambināṃ ratnakuṇḍalānāmacchayā rucā gorocanayeva mantraparijaptayā samālabdhāṅgāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:567: āccakṣire ca svaṃ sva nāma trayo 'pi te /
GK19bahcar3u:570: niḥśabdāṃ ca gambhīrāṃ ca bhīṣaṇāṃ ca sādhanabhūmim /
GK19bahcar3u:571: tasyāṃ ca kumudadhūlidhavalena bhasmanā likhitasya mahato maṇḍalasya madhye sthitaṃ dīptataratejaḥprasaram,
GK19bahcar3u:574: raktacandanānulepino raktasragambarābharaṇasyottānaśayasya śavasyorasyupaviśya jātajātavedasi mukhakuhare prārabdhāgnikāryam,
GK19bahcar3u:584: aṃsāvalambinā bahuguṇena vidyārājeneva brahnasūtraṇa parigṛhītaṃ bhairavācāryamapaśyat /
GK19bahcar3u:590: evaṃ cāvasthiteṣu dikpāleṣu dikpālabhujapañjarapraviṣṭe visrabdhaṃ karma sādhayati
GK19bahcar3u:591: bhairavaṃ bhairavācārye 'ticiraṃ ca kṛtakolāhaleṣu niṣphalaprayatnaṣu pratyūhakāriṣu
GK19bahcar3u:595: mahāvarāhapīvaraskandhapīṭho narakāsura iva bhuvo garbhādudbhūto balidānava iva bhitvotthitaḥ pātālam,
GK19bahcar3u:598: gadgadatayā svarasya svabhāvapāṭalatayā ca cakṣuṣaḥ kṣība iva yauvanamadena valgadgaladāmakaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:599: karasaṃpuṭamṛditayā mṛdā diṅnāgakumbhābhāvaṃsakūṭaupunaḥpunaḥ paripaṅkayan sāndracandanakardamadattairavyavasthāsthāsakairatisitajaladharaśakalaśārita iva śāradākāśaikadeśaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:601: kajñyābandhaṃ vidhāya vilāsavikṣiptena dhavalavyāyāmaphālīpaṭāntena dharaṇitalagatena dhāryamāṇa iva pṛṣṭhataḥ śepeṇa,
GK19bahcar3u:603: bhūmibhaṅgabhayeneva mantharāṇi sthāpayanpadāni nirbharagarvaguru kathamapi śailamiva
GK19bahcar3u:604: gātramudvahan darpeṇa muhurmuhururasi dviguṇite doṣṇi vāme tiryagutkṣipte ca dakṣiṇe
GK19bahcar3u:605: jaṅghākāṇḍe kuṇḍalite ca caṇḍāsphoṭanaṭāṅkāraiḥ karṇavighnanirghātāniva pātayannekendriyavikalamiva
GK19bahcar3u:606: jīvalokaṃ kurvan kuvalayaśyāmalaḥ puruṣa ujjagāma jagāda ca vihasya narasiṃhanādanirghoṣaghorayā
GK19bahcar3u:608: kimayaṃ “vadyāvalepaḥ sahāyamado vā yadasmai janāyāvidhāya baliṃ bāliśa iva siddhimabhilaṣasi?
GK19bahcar3u:610: etāvatā kālena kṣetrādhipatirasya mannāmnaiva labdhavyapadeśasya deśasya nāgataste śrotropakaṇṭhaṃ śrīkaṇṭhanāmā nāgo 'ham?
GK19bahcar3u:611: anicchati mayi kā śaktirgrahaṇasyāpi gantuṃ gagane /
GK19bahcar3u:613: sahasvedānīṃ sahāmunā durnarendreṇa durnayasya phalam' ityabhidhāya ca niṣṭhuraiḥ prakoṣṭhaprahāraistrīnapi ṭīṭibhaprabhṛtīnabhimukhaṃ pradhāvitān saśarīrāvaraṇakṛpāṇānapātayat /
GK19bahcar3u:618: vyapagamanāśaṅkyā nāgadamanamantramaṇḍalabandheneva rundhan daśadiśo naranāthaḥ sāvajñamavādīt--“are kākodara kāka /
GK19bahcar3u:619: mayi sthite rājahaṃse na jihreṣi baliṃ yācitum?
GK19bahcar3u:628: narapatirapi nirāyudhamāyudhena yudhi lajjamāno jetumutsṛjya sacarmaphalakamaṭṭahāsamasimardhoruksayopari babandha bāhuyuddhāya kakṣyām /
GK19bahcar3u:629: yuyudhāte ca nirdayāsphoṭanasphuṭitabhujarudhiraśīkarasicyamānau śilāstambhairiva patadbhirbāhudaṇḍaiḥ śabdamayamiva kurvāṇau bhuvanaṃ tau /
GK19bahcar3u:630: na cirācca pātayāmāya bhūtale bhujaṅgamaṃ bhūpatiḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:636: yato viśrabdhamevācarasi cāpalāni' ityuktvotsasarja ca tam /
GK19bahcar3u:641: atha karatalasthitasyāṭṭahāsasya madhye taḍitamiva nīlajaladharodare sphurantīṃ prabhayā pibantīmiva triyāmām,
GK19bahcar3u:644: karapaṅkajasaṃkocāśaṅkayā śaśāṅkamaṇḍalamiva khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtaṃ nirmalacaraṇanakhanivahanibhena bibhratīm,
GK19bahcar3u:672: vīrāṇāṃ tvapunaruktāḥ paropakārāḥ yato rājā tāṃ praṇamya svārthavimukho bhairavācāryasya siddhiṃ yayāce /
GK19bahcar3u:673: lakṣmīstu devī prītatarahṛdayā vistīryamāṇena cakṣuṣā kṣīrodenevopari paryastenābhiṣiñcantī bhūpālam “evamastu' ityabravīt /
GK19bahcar3u:677: yasminnutpatsyate sarvadvīpānāṃ bhoktā hariścandra iva harṣanāmā cakravartī tribhuvanavijigīṣurdvitīyo
GK19bahcar3u:678: māndhāteva yasyāyaṃ karaḥ svayameva kamalamapahāya grīhaṣyati cāmaram' iti vacaso 'nte tirobabhūva /
GK19bahcar3u:680: bhairavācāryo 'pi tasyā devyāstena vacasā karmaṇā ca samyagupapāditena sadya eva kuntalo kirīṭī kuṇḍalī hārī keyūrī mekhalī mudgarī khaḍhgī ca bhūtvāvāpa vidyādharatvam /
GK19bahcar3u:684: svapne 'pyasaṃbāvitāṃ dātumimāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ kṣamaḥ ko 'nyo bhavantamapahāya /
GK19bahcar3u:686: tvadoyairguṇairupakaraṇīkṛtasya tvatta eva ca labdhātmalābhasya nirlajjate yamasya mūḍhahṛdayasya /
GK19bahcar3u:690: sādhayatu mānyo yathāsamīhitaṃ sthānam' iti pratyācacakṣe /
GK19bahcar3u:691: tathoktaśca bhūbhujā jigamiṣuḥ sudṛḍhaṃ samāliṅgya ṭīṭibhādīn kuvalayavanenevāśyāyaśīkarasrāviṇā sāsreṇa cakṣuṣā vokṣamāṇaḥ kṣitipatiṃ punaruvāca--“tāta/
GK19bahcar3u:701: sarvathā kṛtaghnālāpeṣvasajjanakathāsu ca cetasi kartavyo 'yaṃ svārthaniṣṭhuro janaḥ' ityabhidhāya vegacchinnahārocchalitamuktāphalanikaratāḍitatārāgaṇaṃ gaganatalamutpapāta /
GK19bahcar3u:704: parākramakrītaḥ kartavyeṣu niyogenānugrāhyo grāhitavinayo 'yaṃ janaḥ' ityabhidhāya rājānumoditastadeva bhūyo bhūvivaraṃ viveśa /
GK19bahcar3u:707: vanadevatākucāṃśukāpaharaṇaparihāsasvedinīva sāvaśyāyaśīkare parimalākṛṣṭamadhukṛti kumudanidrāvāhini niśāpariṇatijaḍe tuṣāraleśini vanānile,
GK19bahcar3u:710: unnidrapakṣiṇi kṣarati kusumavisaramiva tuhinakaṇanikaraṃ mṛdupavanalāsitalate kānane,
GK19bahcar3u:712: ujjihānaravirathavājivisṛṣṭaiḥ prothapaṭupavanaiḥ protsāyamāṇāsviva vāruṇyāṃ kakubhi puñjībhavantīṣu śyāmālatākalikāsu tārakāsu,
GK19bahcar3u:714: suravāraṇāṅkuśa iva cyute galati tārāmaye mṛge trīnapi ṭīṭibhādīn gṛhītvā nāgayuddhavyatikaramalīmasāni śucini vanavāpīpayasi prakṣālyāṅgāni nagaraṃ viveśa /
GK19bahcar3u:716: katipayadivasāpagame ca piravrāḍ bhūbhujā vāryamāṇo 'pi vanaṃ yayau /
GK19bahcar3u:719: prathamamupayujyamānau kathāntareṣu cāntarāntarā samādiṣṭo vicitrāṇi bhairavācāryacaritāni
GK19bahcar3u:721: iti mahākaviśrībāṇabhaṭṭakṛte harṣacarite rājadarśanaṃ nāma dṛtīya ucchvāsaḥ
